name: everything starts with one
description:
If browser version doesn't load, try to download windows build
How to play:

Damage dealt scales with attackers GM

In your turn you can:
- play ONE card

There are several types of cards.
Some add Genetic Material (GM), some deal damage to your enemy, some have special actions.
Each card is described.

You always have a card that allows you to draw new ONE.
You can have up to 7 cards in hand.

Gene is your passive ability.
You can only have ONE at a time.
Some cards update Gene.

Your enemy can:
- grow
- attack you
- increase its damage
- copy your Gene

If your GM are below 0 - you lose.
If your enemy GM are below 0 - you win.

Game created for Gmtk gamejam 2019
